name: DEMO - Unfinished Business
description:
Hello! This is a demo of my debut project, a short, hand-drawn, narrative RPG called "Unfinished Business" about helping ghosts complete their last requests. Right now only the first four ghosts are included; the final game will include eight ghost quests, as well as an original soundtrack.

Please let me know if you encounter any bugs or glitches. The game is still very much a work in progress from a first-time solo developer, so I appreciate any help at pointing out oversights or errors. Thank you!
